title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:1
text: Q. What is the sea of glass spoken of by John, 4th chapter, and 6th verse of the Revelation?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:2
text: Q. What are we to understand by the four beasts, spoken of in the same verse?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:3
text: Q. Are the four beasts limited to individual beasts, or do they represent classes or orders?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:4
text: Q. What are we to understand by the eyes and wings, which the beasts had?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:5
text: Q. What are we to understand by the four and twenty elders, spoken of by John?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:6
text: Q. What are we to understand by the book which John saw, which was sealed on the back with seven seals?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:7
text: Q. What are we to understand by the seven seals with which it was sealed?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:8
text: Q. What are we to understand by the four angels, spoken of in the 7th chapter and 1st verse of Revelation?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:9
text: Q. What are we to understand by the angel ascending from the east, Revelation 7th chapter and 2nd verse?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:10
text: Q. What time are the things spoken of in this chapter to be accomplished?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:11
text: Q. What are we to understand by sealing the one hundred and forty-four thousand, out of all the tribes of Israel--twelve thousand out of every tribe?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:12
text: Q. What are we to understand by the sounding of the trumpets, mentioned in the 8th chapter of Revelation?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:13
text: Q. When are the things to be accomplished, which are written in the 9th chapter of Revelation?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:14
text: Q. What are we to understand by the little book which was eaten by John, as mentioned in the 10th chapter of Revelation?

title: Doctrine and Covenants 77:15
text: Q. What is to be understood by the two witnesses, in the eleventh chapter of Revelation?
